# scaleVisibility

**Instance Property**

The visibility of the scale view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scaleVisibility: MKFeatureVisibility { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can configure a scale view to be visible all the time or only when the scale of the map changes.

## Getting the scale view attributes

- **mapView**: The map view that provides the scale information to the scale view.
- **legendAlignment**: The alignment of the distance information in the scale view.
- **MKScaleView.Alignment**: Constants that indicate how the framework should align measurements.
